name: IsNinjaStreaming
0:
”Alexa, open ninja stream”
”Alexa, ask ninja stream if ninja is streaming”
”Alexa, ask ninja stream if he is streaming”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ninja stream
des: When Ninja is streaming can be a touch unpredictable. Instead of logging onto twitch and checkin, you can quickly ask if he is online.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
